app.name: Pars en Cours
app.tagline: Connecting students in need of transportation with those who can help

step2.title: How to use the app
step2.subtitle: Discover the main features and how to navigate

askFeature.title: Ask for help
askFeature.description: Request donations or assistance from the community. This icon lets you create a help request.

giveFeature.title: Give donations
giveFeature.description: Offer help, resources, or donations to those in need. This icon lets you create a donation offer.

mapFeature.title: Explore the map
mapFeature.description_student: Find donations and requests for help near you.
mapFeature.description_not_student: Find requests for help near you.

messagesFeature.title: Stay connected
messagesFeature.description: Communicate with other users through private messages.

step2.studentAdditionalFeatures: As a student, you can also:

step3.title: Create Your Account
step3.subtitle: Set up your nostr identity to start

explanation.title: What is Nostr?
explanation.description: Nostr is a decentralized protocol that gives you full control over your identity and data.

relays.title: Relays
relays.description: Your posts are distributed across multiple relay servers, ensuring your data remains available even if some relays go offline.

publicKey.title: Public Key = Username
publicKey.description: Your public key is your unique identifier that others can use to find and verify your posts.

privateKey.title: Private Key = Password
privateKey.description: Your private key signs your posts and proves they're from you.
privateKey.warning: Keep it secret and secure - it cannot be changed if lost!

keyGeneration.importLabel: Enter your private key (nsec or hex):
keyGeneration.warningMessage: Save your private key safely! If you lose it, you'll lose access to your account permanently.

keysGenerated.title: Keys Generated!
keysGenerated.message: Your Nostr keys have been generated. Please save your private key securely - you'll need it to access your account.

generateError.title: Error
generateError.message: Failed to generate keys. Please try again.

invalidKey.title: Error
invalidKey.message: Invalid private key format. Please enter a valid nsec key or hex string.

importSuccess.title: Success!
importSuccess.message: Your keys have been imported successfully.

importFailed.title: Error
importFailed.message: Failed to import keys. Please check your private key and try again.

copyError.title: Error
copyError.message: Failed to copy key to clipboard.

messages.title: Messages
messages.startConversation: Start a conversation by interacting with posts!
messages.dmRelaysConfiguredMessage: You have {{count}} DM relay(s) configured: {{relays}}. Do you want to update them?
messages.dmRelaysPublishedMessage: Successfully published {{count}} DM relay(s). You can now receive private messages!
messages.dmRelaysError: Failed to check DM relays. Please try again.
messages.noWriteRelays: No write relays configured. Please add relays in Settings first.
messages.dmRelaysPublishError: Failed to publish DM relays. Please try again.

conversation.sendError: Failed to send message. Please try again.
conversation.recipientNoDMRelays: This user has not set up direct messaging yet. They need to configure their DM inbox relays first.
conversation.notAuthenticated: You must be logged in to send messages.

profile.title: Profile
profile.subtitle: Manage your account and posts
profile.pleaseLogin: Please log in to access your profile
profile.noPostsDescription: Create your first post using the + button below

resetOnboardingConfirm.title: Reset onboarding
resetOnboardingConfirm.message: This will restart the onboarding process. Are you sure?
resetOnboardingConfirm.successMessage: Onboarding has been reset. Restart the app to see the onboarding process.

transport.ask: Hey! I'm interested in your request for light transport: {{title}}. Is it still available?
transport.give: Hey! I'm interested in your light transport offer: {{title}}. Is it still available?

repair.ask: Hey! I can help with your repair request: {{title}}. Are you still looking for assistance?
repair.give: Hey! I'm interested in your repair service: {{title}}. Are you still offering this service?

carpool.ask: Hey! I can offer you a ride for: {{title}}. Are you still looking for a carpool?
carpool.give: Hey! I'm interested in your carpool offer: {{title}}. Is the spot still available?

general.ask: Hey! I can help with your request: {{title}}. Are you still looking for assistance?
general.give: Hey! I'm interested in your offer: {{title}}. Is it still available?

edit.title: Edit Profile
edit.name: Name
edit.profileMediaDescription: Add images to personalize your profile.
edit.contactLinksDescription: Add ways for others to contact you or learn more.
edit.unsavedChangesMessage: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to go back?

map.postAtLocation: Your post will be created at the selected location.
map.selectLocationMessage: Tap on the map to choose where you want to create this post.
map.locationNotAvailableMessage: Your location is not available. Please check your location permissions and try again.
map.beFirstToCreate: Be the first to create a post!

createPost.title: Title
createPost.titlePlaceholderAsk: e.g., Need a bike to go to class
createPost.locationHelper: A geohash is a short code that represents a location area.
createPost.privacyNotice: Your exact location is never shared. Lower accuracy levels provide more privacy but less precision.

validation.title: Validation Error
validation.titleRequired: Please enter a title for your post.
validation.geohashRequired: Please set a location for your post.
validation.categoryRequired: Please select a category for your post.

errors.title: Error
errors.noPrivateKey: No private key found. Please login again.
errors.noWriteRelays: No write relays available. Please configure relays in settings.
errors.publishFailed: Failed to publish post. Please try again.
errors.locationPermissionMessage: Location permission is required to use your current location.
errors.locationFailed: Failed to get current location. Please try again.

success.title: Success!
success.message: Your {{type}} has been published to {{count}} relay(s).
success.failedMessage: Failed to publish to any relays. Please check your connection and try again.

createPost.imageHelper: Add URLs to images you want to include with your post

removeRelayConfirm.title: Remove Relay
removeRelayConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to remove this relay?

resetOnboardingConfirm.title: Reset onboarding
resetOnboardingConfirm.message: This will restart the onboarding process. Are you sure?
resetOnboardingConfirm.successMessage: Onboarding has been reset. Restart the app to see the onboarding process.

logoutConfirm.title: Log Out
logoutConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to log out? You will need to log in again to access your account.

bookmarks.title: Bookmarks
bookmarks.emptyMessage: Bookmark posts you find interesting by tapping the bookmark button on any post.
bookmarks.errorMessage: Something went wrong while loading your bookmarks.
bookmarks.removeBookmarkConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove "{{title}}" from your bookmarks?
bookmarks.failedToUpdate: Failed to update bookmark. Please try again.
bookmarks.failedToRefresh: Failed to refresh bookmarks. Please try again.

postDetail.failedToUpdateBookmark: Failed to update bookmark. Please try again.
postDetail.reportPostConfirm: Are you sure you want to report this post?
postDetail.shareError: Failed to share post. Please try again.
postDetail.contactMessageAsk: Hi! I'm interested in helping with your request: {{title}}
postDetail.contactMessageGive: Hi! I'm interested in your offer: {{title}}
postDetail.messageSentMessage: Your message has been sent! You can continue the conversation in Messages.
postDetail.sendMessageError: Failed to send message. Please try again.
postDetail.notAuthenticated: You must be logged in to send messages.
postDetail.cannotMessageYourself: You cannot send a message to yourself.
postDetail.recipientNoDMRelays: This user has not set up direct messaging yet. They need to configure their DM inbox relays first.
